name: Only One Pair of Clean Pants!
name_original: Only One Pair of Clean Pants!
description: This game revolves around the concept of only one... pair of clean pants. You need to figure out how to navigate every day life while keeping your pants at a socially acceptable level of clean. You will be faced with scenarios and situations revolved around keeping your pants clean, remember when choosing how to proceed, think "what would this do to my pants?" This is an entry into the GMTK 2019 48 Hour Game Jam. It was made by 3 web developers using VueJS and MS Paint. We hope you enjoy it.
